name: Tale of Three Lands
description:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure through three lands. Escape the Durand family vineyards before you are overwhelmed by the Kattar Savages. Brave the marsh and overcome the Terror of the Rotten Rose, dispatching brigands along the path. Test your mettle against a giant centipede, and find a way to escape a strange realm.

   Our team was inspired by legendary games such as Caves of Quds and Dwarf Fortress: Adventure mode to create a unique and accessible Roguelike experience that's perfect for players of all levels. We're excited to share with you Tale of Three Lands, a short project that showcases an easy to pick up hard to master turn-based experience.

   We would love to receive your feedback on Tale of Three Lands. If you have a few moments to spare, please fill out our survey below and let us know what you think. Thank you! https://forms.gle/pmBrQWqtvjhv5Roc8

   Additionally, if you have extra questions or comments you can reach out to Ethan Stringham at stringhamethan@gmail.com or Jordan at wizardwithahat000@gmail.com.
